[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/KGbg0Kq.png[/img][/align]

[color=transparent]Headlines[/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1320406][img]https://i.imgur.com/2y33FQO.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=white][b]Accepting Credit Cards in 2018[/b][/color]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has announced that credit cards will be an accepted method of payment for upgrades starting January 2018. He hopes this addition will be convenient for new members who want to upgrade but are not familiar with cryptocurrencies. Many members have expressed their excitement in response to this announcement and hopefully it will positively impact the forum. [size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5776335]>> Source[/url][/size]

[color=white][b]Prestige Formula Changed[/b][/color]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] altered the prestige formula once more to include the number of threads users have created. Members now earn more prestige for starting discussions than just posting responses. The new formula has already been cracked by [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1651695][color=#FFFFFF][b]☃BowmanBot☃[/b][/color][/url], [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=509788][b]Makaveli The Don[/b][/url] and [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1306528][color=#FFFFFF][b]xadamxk[/b][/color][/url] in [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5774611]this[/url] thread. [size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5773461]>> Source[/url][/size]

[color=transparent]Memo[/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1320406][img]https://i.imgur.com/AUmQS7T.png[/img][/url]

It's a new day, it's a new year. We are officially in the year 2018, with edition 375 as the first news edition of the year.

If you are interested in being a writer for the HF News, please [url=https://hackforums.net/private.php?action=send&uid=1320406]PM me[/url].[/align]
